languages.text: "Ты устал{mf||а} грести в бушующих водах своей жизни, и я протянула тебе руку помощи. Ухватиться за нее или же справиться самостоятельно — только твой выбор. Так сделай его".
"You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is yours to make. So make it."
languages.original_text: "Ты устал{mf||а} грести в бушующих водах своей жизни, и я протянула тебе руку помощи. Ухватиться за нее или же справиться самостоятельно — только твой выбор. Так сделай его".

traits.locale_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is your choice, and yours alone. So make it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is your choice, and yours alone. So make it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is yours to make. So make it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我看到你在努力抵抗如洪水般汹涌的压力，劳累不支，所以才伸出了援手。是要接受我的帮助，还是一个人继续苦撑，你自己选吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is yours to make. So make it."

traits.locale_text: “我看到你在努力抵抗如洪水般汹涌的压力，劳累不支，所以才伸出了援手。是要接受我的帮助，还是一个继续苦撑，你自己选吧。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Estás {mf|harto|harta} de debatirte en las procelosas aguas de tu vida, por eso te extiendo una mano amiga. La elección de aceptarla o seguir luchando tú {mf|solo|sola} es tuya. Decídete».
languages.original_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is yours to make. So make it."

traits.locale_text: «Estás {mf|harto|harta} de debatirte en las procelosas aguas de tu vida, por eso te extiendo una mano amiga. La elección de aceptarla o seguir luchando tú {mf|solo|sola} es tuya. Decídete».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|las|lasse} de lutter contre les vagues déferlantes de la vie, et je vous tends une main secourable. C'est à vous de décider si vous souhaitez vous en saisir ou si vous préférez continuer à lutter {mf|seul|seule}. Faites votre choix. »
languages.original_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is yours to make. So make it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|las|lasse} de lutter contre les vagues déferlantes de la vie, et je vous tends une main secourable. C'est à vous de décider si vous souhaitez vous en saisir ou si vous préférez continuer à lutter {mf|seul|seule}. Faites votre choix. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid es müde, die reißenden Wasser Eures Lebens zu bekämpfen, und darum reiche ich Euch meine Hand. Ob Ihr sie ergreift oder alleine weiterkämpft, ist Eure Entscheidung. Also trefft sie."
languages.original_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is yours to make. So make it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid es müde, die reißenden Wasser Eures Lebens zu bekämpfen, und darum reiche ich Euch meine Hand. Ob Ihr sie ergreift oder alleine weiterkämpft, ist Eure Entscheidung. Also trefft sie."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは自分の人生の荒れ狂う流れとの戦いに疲れている。故に、私はあなたに手を差し伸べよう。それを掴むか、一人で戦うかはあなた委ねられている。だから、決断するのだ」
languages.original_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is yours to make. So make it."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは自分の人生の荒れ狂う流れとの戦いに疲れている。故に、私はあなたに手を差し伸べよう。それを掴むか、一人で戦うかはあなた委ねられている。だから、決断するのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hayatının gürleyen şelalesiyle savaşmakta zorlanıyorsun, bu yüzden sana yardım eli uzatıyorum. Elimi tutmak veya tek başına savaşmaya devam etmek, senin kararın. Kararını ver."
languages.original_text: "You are tired of fighting the raging waters of your life, and so I am holding out my hand to you. The choice to grab it or to fight alone is yours to make. So make it."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatının gürleyen şelalesiyle savaşmakta zorlanıyorsun, bu yüzden sana yardım eli uzatıyorum. Elimi tutmak veya tek başına savaşmaya devam etmek senin kararın. Kararını ver."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
